title: Helvedes Hus
overview: In the program, three families seek help from carpenter and building designer Casper Kjerumgaard and host Camilla Ottesen, who are ready to take on the challenges. But Camilla and Casper can only help one of the families! And when the choice is made, they do everything in their power to save the family from their hell and transform their home into what the family has so far only dared to dream of.
